description:
This fragment is imbued with Diao Chan's valor, and emits a surprisingly gentle hint of perfume.

Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Diao Chan.

This key is partially infused with Hansel and Gretel's will. The fragments gleam faintly in the sun. 

 Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Hansel and Gretel.

The will of Alucard lies within these fragments. They emanate a fierce, ancient power.

Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Alucard.

The will of Astraea lies within these fragments.

Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Astraea.

The will of Cesela lies within these fragments. They give off a faint glow like a distant star.

 Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Cesela.

Use to get a 20% boost to XP earned for the next 7 days!
Timer will continue while you're logged off.

Can stack with other XP boost items to a maximum bonus of 500%.
Using multiple Seven Day XP Crystals will not stack, but will add to the total duration of the effect.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 2000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.

This svelte, elegant fox is so fast, it seems to float across the snow without a trace. Though it has nine tails, it only serves one master.

Use: Right-click to ride the mount and increase Move SPD.
Description

Fortifies weapons up to +5.Right-click to open the Fortification menu.
Use this blessing scroll to guarantee a level up of accessories Lv.5 and below.

The gear's energy is lodged within it. Use it to obtain 500 Gaia Fragments.

The maximum amount of Gaia Fragments is 9999. This number cannot be exceeded.

This comfy carriage has been custom-made to accommodate Zinnia's craving for adventure.

Right-click to summon this sweet ride.
Place in your backpack or your warehouse to increase capacity by twenty slots.

The free-spirited Griffin never bows to humans... unless, of course, you've got what it takes to become its master.

Right-click to summon this mount.
Will automatically fortify a piece of armor one level, without fail, up to level 5. Right-click to open the Fortification menu.
Will automatically fortify a weapon one level, without fail, up to level 5. Right-click to open the Fortification menu.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 1000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description

When the sun sets, this mysterious unicorn is said to guide the moon into the sky and chase the sun to the other end of the world. It is rare for this unicorn to choose a riding partner.

Right-click to summon this mount.

This lion is covered with silver fur and can race effortlessly through frost and snow.

 Right-click to ride on the Lion and increase Move SPD.

Will fortify weapons up to +15.
Right-click to open the Fortification menu.
Provides higher benefits than a typical Fortification Scroll.

Will fortify armor up to +15.
Right-click to open the Fortification menu.
Provides higher benefits than a typical Fortification Scroll.

Once used, the guardian sprite will stay at your side for 24 hours.

The timer does not pause even if logged out.
Only one sprite can be active at a time.

Once used, the guardian sprite will stay at your side for 24 hours.

The timer does not pause even if logged out.
Only one sprite can be active at a time.

Use before defeating a boss for a chance at better loot! Right-click to use.
Only one loot charm can be active at a time. Not effective for loot-via-mail boss monsters.
Place in your backpack or your warehouse to increase capacity by twenty slots.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.

All the living creatures that were created by the Cube of Gaia have a notch. This potential, when powered by evolutionary beads, can unleash powerful strength.

The key material for an Eidolon's Three-Star Level Evolution.
When the Eidolon reaches Three Stars, it will gain a different appearance.
Eidolons who can be evolved into Three-Star Level:
<Eternal Youth> Serif
<Cheery Sylph> Merrilee
<Daring Dragon> Grimm
<Regal Unicorn> Alessa
<Heavenly Defender> Uzuriel
<Emerald Tempest> Yarnaros
<Infernal Efreet> Zaahir
<Nine-Tailed Vixen> Kotonoha
<Knight of the Sun> Aelius
<Stormbringer> Vayu
<Iron Titan> Gigas
<Duke of Darkness> Eligos
<Empress of Torment> Bel-Chandra
<Silent Assassin> Tsubaki
<Champion of the Slain> Sigrun
<Great Leviathan> Nazrudin
<Feline Emperor> Tigerius Caesar
<Trampling Thunder> Bahadur
<Phoenix Enchantress> Vermilion
<Panther Pharaoh> Cleopawtra
Description

This crystal, infused with the strength of Gaia, can be fused to evolve certain materials. 

It can be fused with 1-Star weapons to upgrade them to 2-Star.

This crystal, infused with the strength of Gaia, can be fused to evolve certain materials. 

It can be fused with 1-Star armor to upgrade it to 2-Star.

A special voucher used to purchase items. Use to receive 100 voucher points. Thanks for enjoying Aura Kingdom!

The maximum limit for coupons is 9,999; you cannot obtain more coupons after this set limit.
Right-click to enchant Weapons or Weapon Enchantments.
Right-click to enchant an Ornament or Ornament Enchantments.
Right-click to enchant Costumes or Costume Enchantments.

Use this to reshuffle a weapon or piece of armor's random bonuses (between 110% - 130%).
This can only be used on items up to level 75.

 For Orange quality items only.

Use this to reshuffle a weapon or piece of armor's random bonuses (between 110% - 120%).
This can only be used on items up to level 75.

 For Purple quality items only.

Use this to reshuffle a weapon or piece of armor's random bonuses (between 110% - 140%).
This can only be used on items up to level 75.

 For Gold quality items only.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 2000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description

The will of Hel lies within these fragments. They exude a dark, resonating force.

Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Hel.

Fragments containing the will of Kotonoha. Magical energy surrounds them.

Obtain the Eidolon "Kotonoha" by fusing ten fragments.

The will of Kusanagi lies within these fragments. The fragments flicker like tiny bolts of electricity.

 Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Kusanagi.

Fortifies weapons up to +15.Right-click to open the Fortification menu.
Use this blessing scroll to guarantee a level up of accessories Lv.15 and below.
The violet particles floating around in these thin, crystalline wings are the epitome of the sublime.

This harp was made from a rare ore extracted from a distant ice plain. It took a luthier his entire lifetime to carve the instrument, but he never heard it played. 

All weapon types can be displayed when not in combat, but only primary and secondary weapon types are displayed during combat.
Alucard's dyed costume was painstakingly crafted from individual dragon scales. It's dry clean only, so try not to spill coffee on it. Wear it to transform into Alucard.
Strut around town wearing Alucard's hair, and you'll transform into the dragon king himself. Talk about a good hair day!

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description
Got a bone to pick with the beasts of hell? Then why not slip into these debonair duds? Demon slaying never looked so good!
This do-it-yourself hairstyle has been perfected after a lifetime on the road.

Nothing can come between this rare crimson bird and its meal as it regally waddles after its prey.

Right-click to ride the bird and increase your speed.

This fragment is imbued with Diao Chan's valor, and emits a surprisingly gentle hint of perfume.

Fuse ten key fragments to be granted a pact with Diao Chan.

Fragments containing the will of Tanith. Blood seems to flow through the fragments.

Obtain the Eidolon "Tanith" by fusing ten fragments.

Shouted "Trick or Treat!" Summon the White Pumpkin Kitty.

Only one companion can be summoned at a time.

A special voucher used to purchase items. Use to receive 100 voucher points. Thanks for enjoying Aura Kingdom!

The maximum limit for coupons is 9,999; you cannot obtain more coupons after this set limit.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description
Will automatically fortify a weapon one level, without fail, up to level 15. Right-click to open the Fortification menu.
Will automatically fortify a piece of armor one level, without fail, up to level 15. Right-click to open the Fortification menu.

A broom infused with powerful magic. Fly the friendly skies!

Use: Right-click to mount the magic broom and increase your movement speed.
With this fusion formula, you can fuse 4 "Magic Brooms" into 1 "Naughty Magic Broom."

This key contains the will of Endora. The grinning pumpkin-shaped key sometimes emits a creepy cackle!

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Endora.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Endora.

This key contains the will of Tsubaki. The soothing fragrance emanating from it eases fatigue and restores energy after a fierce battle.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Tsubaki.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Tsubaki.

Effective for 7 days after using.

The timer counts down even if you are logged off.
If the same item is used repeatedly, only the time can be accumulated.

Effective for 7 days after using.

The timer counts down even if you are logged off.
If the same item is used repeatedly, only the time can be accumulated.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description

This key contains the will of Shirayuki. Its icy surface exudes a piercing chill.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Shirayuki.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Shirayuki.

Move an ability from one item to another. Right-click to open the Ability Transfer menu.

Source item will not keep the transferred ability.
Chance of transferred ability losing 1 - 4 fortification levels.
Recipient item will be bound, any fortification bonuses will be lost.

All the living creatures that were created by the Cube of Gaia have a notch. This potential, when powered by evolutionary beads, can unleash powerful strength.

The key material for an Eidolon's Three-Star Level Evolution.
When the Eidolon reaches Three Stars, it will gain a different appearance.
Eidolons who can be evolved into Three-Star Level:
<Eternal Youth> Serif
<Cheery Sylph> Merrilee
<Daring Dragon> Grimm
<Regal Unicorn> Alessa
<Heavenly Defender> Uzuriel
<Emerald Tempest> Yarnaros
<Infernal Efreet> Zaahir
<Nine-Tailed Vixen> Kotonoha
<Knight of the Sun> Aelius
<Stormbringer> Vayu
<Iron Titan> Gigas

<Silent Assassin> Tsubaki
<Champion of the Slain> Sigrun

<Feline Emperor> Tigerius Caesar
<Trampling Thunder> Bahadur
<Phoenix Enchantress> Vermilion

Use before defeating a boss for a chance at better loot! Right-click to use.
Only one loot charm can be active at a time. Not effective for loot-via-mail boss monsters.

This crystal, infused with the strength of Gaia, can be fused to evolve certain materials. 

It can be fused with 3-Star armor to upgrade it to 4-Star.

This crystal, infused with the strength of Gaia, can be fused to evolve certain materials. 

It can be fused with 3-Star weapons to upgrade them to 4-Star.
This elegant dress, once worn by Moonlight Maiden Serena herself, imparts the wearer's every movement with a sense of grace, breaking hearts left and right.
Long, wavy hair and a hairpiece modeled after the Moonlight Maiden, this is the new in style for girls with a sense of fashion.

This key contains the will of Serena. It shines softly like the moonlight in a clear night sky.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Serena.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Serena.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description
The cool, breezy beach gear will make you the star of the show. Go get your swim on!
The painstakingly forged armor brings out the duchess in you. Its flirty skirt lets you take it from the battlefield straight to Happy Hour!

Summer is here, and Kotonoha is ready to accompany the Envoy of Gaia to the beach! The sleek design and deadly red color make for an eye-catching combo.

Select 'Gift' (Hotkey N) in the Eidolon Menu and click 'Change Appearance' to change an Eidolon's costume.

The adorable Serena is ready to accompany the Envoy of Gaia to the beach, and she has an adorable swimsuit to match! Even her rabbit is getting into the spirit with a summery costume change.

Select 'Gift' (Hotkey N) in the Eidolon Menu and click 'Change Appearance' to change an Eidolon's costume.

The devilishly cute Cesela is ready to accompany the Envoy of Gaia to the beach in this stylish, striped swimsuit. Even her rascally rabbit is getting into the spirit with updated duds!

Select 'Gift' (Hotkey N) in the Eidolon Menu and click 'Change Appearance' to change an Eidolon's costume.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 10,000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description

Equipped with a unique core, the enormous energy compressed within this devastating cannon is so destructive, it has the power to erase enemies from the space-time continuum itself.

All weapon types can be displayed when not in combat, but only primary and secondary weapon types are displayed during combat.

Locked within the code of these divine magic wings lies the answers to the mysteries of the universe. Only those sanctioned by the gods can access this ancient knowledge.

When out of combat, all weapon types can be shown. While in combat, only primary and secondary weapon types will be shown.
Nothing says metal like wearing actual metal! Show that's you're really hardcore and get out on that stage and jam!
Your favorite song is playing! Time for some headbanging. Just make sure your cap doesn't fall off!
Glistening white wings that will bring you closer to levitation than you ever thought possible.
Will automatically fortify a piece of armor one level, without fail, up to level 20. Right-click to open the Fortification menu.
Will automatically fortify a weapon one level, without fail, up to level 20. Right-click to open the Fortification menu.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description
The painstakingly forged armor brings out the duchess in you. Its flirty skirt lets you take it from the battlefield straight to Happy Hour!
This hair accessory gleams and pulses with magical power. The wearer will appear both agile and noble - maybe even at the same time!
Beautiful, lightweight pink feathers that will make you the star of the show when you flutter them.

It is rumored that the blade is forged with thousands of souls, and is still assimilating weak-minded souls into its mysterious shadow blade.

All weapon types can be displayed when not in combat, but only primary and secondary weapon types are displayed during combat.

Skee, the favorite sword of the Bringer of Light, Bealdor. It glows with a brilliant light that is rumored to pierce through darkness and purify evilness, justifying the title bestowed upon it.

All weapon types can be displayed when not in combat, but only primary and secondary weapon types are displayed during combat.

This key contains the will of Cesela. Its radiant light shines like the North Star.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Cesela.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Cesela.

This key is infused with Hansel and Gretel's will. It smells of gingerbread and maple syrup. 

Right-click to obtain Eidolon - Hansel and Gretel. 
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice. 
This key is also used for Hansel and Gretel's evolution.

This key contains the will of Astraea. This key's wings are resplendent with holy light.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Astraea.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Astraea.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description

This key is imbued with the valor of Diao Chan, and a surprisingly gentle hint of perfume seems to emanate from it.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Diao Chan.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Diao Chan.

A special voucher used to purchase items. Use to receive 100 voucher points. Thanks for enjoying Aura Kingdom!

The maximum limit for coupons is 9,999; you cannot obtain more coupons after this set limit.

Shouted "Trick or Treat!" Summon the Black Lantern Magic Kitty.

Only one companion can be summoned at a time.
Truly refined precious metal is lightweight like a feather. The armor is made using this metal and adorned with premium silk to create the ultimate armor set for a king.
Exquisite crystal accessory dyed in rose red. Its magical properties emits light particles which enhances the glamor of the wearer.
Fearless against the vast ocean and sailing to the uncharted territories in exploration. That is the first step to becoming the lord of the oceans.

itemname: Lord of the Ocean Captain Hat
description: The hat worn by the legendary conqueror of the ocean. If you want to become a lord of the ocean, wear your captain hat and lead your sailors to pursue your dreams.

This key contains the will of Tanith. Decorated by blood-colored floral patterns, it trembles with a vigorous energy.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Tanith.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Tanith.

Coins that can be used for refining. Use to receive 5000 points in Ruby Coins. Thank you for supporting Aura Kingdom!

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.
Description

This key contains the will of Cleopawtra. Sub-zero ice crystals surround it as the air around it freezes.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Cleopawtra.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Cleopawtra.
Once this coldblooded killer has you in his sights, the only thing you'll see are the whites of his eyes as the life drains from your body.
Surrounded by an aura of death, once this merciless predator sets his eyes on you, your fate is sealed.

This key contains the will of Cleopawtra. Sub-zero ice crystals surround it as the air around it freezes.

Right-click to obtain the Eidolon Cleopawtra.
You cannot obtain the same Eidolon twice.
This key is also used in the evolution of Cleopawtra.
This trendy kimono's unique, laced design has made it the talk of the town.
When that special someone sees the ribbons and lace on this adorable bow, it'll be love at first sight!
This premium wedding gown was especially designed to make the dreams of young girls come true!
It's bad luck to see the bride! This exquisite veil will make the most important day in your life unforgettable!
Finally ready to tie the knot? Then go the extra mile to show you really mean 'I do' with these premium dapper duds.
This fancy yet sturdy hat is built to last! Wear it to a high-noon duel or just to go out and visit friends. This hat will make you look like the baddest guy in town.
A deep red rose, most commonly used to symbolize love. Be careful who you give it to!

A special voucher used to purchase items. Use to receive 100 voucher points. Thanks for enjoying Aura Kingdom!

The maximum limit for coupons is 9,999; you cannot obtain more coupons after this set limit.

You are limited to 99,999 Ruby Coins. This limit cannot be exceeded.

This magic broom comes with a sassy black witch-cat that flies around with you!

Use: Right-click to mount the magic broom and increase your movement speed.
